altTitles.fr: Je suis la secrétaire du tyran

altTitles.es: Me convertí en la secretaria de un tirano

altTitles.mn: Би дарангуйлагчийн нарийн бичиг болсон нь

altTitles.th: ฉันกลายเป็นเลขาของทรราช

altTitles.en: I Became the Secretary of the Tyrant

description.en:
I became the secretary of a tyrant in place of my clumsy brother to survive. But I have so much potential for it. I’m so darn good at my job. Because I served the tyrant so well, ‘Everyone has a happy ending’. Well then, shall I quit being a secretary and live a leisurely life now? “Rosalyn, tell me what you want.” He asked as he stepped down from his chair. “I want to quit.” His eyebrows twitched slightly. “Do you want to die?” Your highness, you never hold on to people who want to leave, so why’re you being like this to me?

---
To save my family from certain doom, I offered to become the Emperor’s secretary in place of my clumsy brother. I excelled at work in my previous life… to the point of overworking myself, but that’s beside the point! I know I got this. I served the tyrant emperor perfectly, down to a T, so now I can quit working and the plot can continue on. But when I asked to resign, he retorted, “Do you want to die?” Your Majesty, you’ve always been disinterested in people, why are you holding me back? Please let me live the rest of my life peacefully!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EC%84%9C%EA%B4%80%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2645), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57096997)

description.uk:
Я стала секретаркою тирана замість свого незграбного брата, щоб вижити.

Але я маю для цього великий потенціал. Я дуже добре справляюся зі своєю роботою. Тому я так добре служила тирану, «У кожного щасливий кінець».

Ну що ж, кину я бути секретарем і тепер житиму неквапливим життям?

«Розаліна, скажи мені, чого ти хочеш». — спитав він, спускаючись зі стільця.

---
